title: Projecting AI Task Completion to 2030
description: Interactive visualization showing exponential growth of AI task completion capabilities from 2019 to 2030, with time on the horizontal axis and projected horizons based on 7-month doubling time.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: AI Capabilities
Exponential Growth
AI Benchmarks
Future Projections
METR Research
learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of projecting ai task completion to 2030
Explore projecting ai task completion to 2030 through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of projecting ai task completion to 2030 to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on projecting ai task completion to 2030
